description:
**Date Posted:**


2023-12-11**Country:**


India**Location:**


Nethra Tech Park, Old No 181, New plot No 40, EPIP Industrial Area Sy No 28, Kundalahalli Village, Krishnarajapuram, Bengaluru, India**Position Role Type:**


Unspecified
Senior Associate Engineer Mechanical engineer


Collins Aerospace has challenging career opportunity for Senior Associate Engineer. We are seeking an experienced professional to execute our manufacturing goals and objectives for satisfying customer requirements for mechanical products. He must be proactive. high with energy, motivatedindividual who thrives in a fast-paced environment in manufacturing. This role is for Manufacturing engineeringfunction.


Primary Responslbllltles:

* Responsible for working with Engineeringteam to understand existing and new products being introduced or transitioned from other facilities into the production floor.
* Develops manufacturing processes,designing, modifying. and testingmanufacturingmethods and equipment; conferringwith equipment vendors.
* Create process flows, process requirements Uigs, fixtures,equipment's, machines,consumables etc.), and manufacturing work instruction for preduct.
* Define Material Masters. Bill of Materials and routingsin SAP and validate the same with drawing requirements.

* Provide manufacturing decision-making information by calculating production,labor, and material costs; reviewing production schedules; estimatingfuture requirements.
* Exposure to production floor layout and define facility requirements
* Work with Engineering/ Design teams to define specifications, requirements,drawings for jigs / fixtures / equipment *I* machines required for the product line.
* Co-ordinate with Supply Cha into identify procurement sources, interact with vendors for the procurement, installation, verification and validation of all items required for setting up the product line
* Perform capacity analysis to define the resources requiredfor meeting customer demand volumes.

* Train and develop recruited operators to desiredlevel of skill and competency

* Co-ordinate with multiple functions like Procurement.Quality, Planning etc. to ensure product line readiness to build prototypes, First Articles, and ramp up production until the product line meets the requiredlevel of output in terms of delivery and Quality and hand over to Production function.
* Work as Manufacturingteam along with multiple functions to set up product line

* Interact with US counterparts / customers to understand requirements etc.
* Work closely work with team for welding*I* brazing technology in manufacturing.
* Exposure to Manual TIG welding, Auto TIG Welding,Plasma welding,Torch brazingand other metaljoining processes

* Exposure/Experience to special process procedures covering metal joining procedure, filler metal handling, shielding gas procedures, welder *I* brazingoperator qualification, Equipment qualification meeting AWS specifications
* Develop weld maps,WPS, PQR for various joint classifications
* Carrying out and interpreting results of joints carried out by welding and brazing of aerospace grade Stainless Steel and Nickel based alloys.
* Perform inspections on products with the help of non-destructive testing methods such as Digital Radiography, Macro examination, Ultrasonic testing and other relevant inspection procedures
* Identify and implement customer,regulatory special process specifications and requirements into manufacturing applications by incorporating these specifications into the company procedures and provide training on the application of procedures. specifically with a focus on welding processes.
* Conduct audits with outsourced suppliers for welding processes in accordance to customer specifications. These audits are specific to the special processes of weldingin accordance with the customer and NADCAP.
* Investigate, analyze and provide solutions to problems for processes and product nonconformance. Key member in driving root cause, corrective action using QCPC/ 8D/SQC process or similar other RRCA tools. Exposure to VSM, Standard work, Cell design, TPM.
* Review and approve changes to engineering documents/specifications assuring continued compliance with customer requirements. Ability to read, understand, follow Drawings,Manufacturing Documents and Safety procedures,
* Ability to perform simple preventative maintenance on the machines
* Must have experience in Visual Inspection of welded joints

* Other related activities and projects as assigned.

**Professional** **Qualification:**
===================================


Mechanical engineering/Industrial Engineering/Process Engineeringwith International Welding Engineer (IWE} from International Institute of Welding (llW) through standard route (Equivalent to European Welding Engineer -EWE) with 5-7 years of relevant experiencein manufacturing industry.

**Required****Ski****lls:**
===========================

* Strong knowledge of Mechanical processes/Electronic Devices, drawings, specifications and industry standards.

* Experiencein Blueprint reading, Technical writing,Manufacturing tool design, Industrial or occupational safety, Manufacturing process design and analysis
* Strong knowledge of Mfgand Procedures, process quality, technical Information
* Experience inAerospace Industry will be desirable.

* Relevant experience in SAP ERP system.
* Awareness of Lean Mfgand implementation tools *I* Statistical Process Control
* Good communication skills,self-motivator

* Must have 2+ years' experience in Welding and Welding process development.

* Weldingexperience relating to material properties in hightemperature alloys is required.

* Familiarity with Welding,brazing processes, its operation and maintenance.

* Experiencein resolvingissues in a timely and effective way using proper QC tools.

* Knowledge of QMS,proceduresin accordance with the AS9100.

* Experienceinthe Aerospace industry is highly preferred

* Good verbal,written, interpersonal communication skills, good team player.

* Must comply to company policies, procedures and safety instructions

* Should workin shifts and on extended hours based on manufacturing requirements.

Collins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market.


Collins Aerospace’s Aerostructures business is a world leader in the design, manufacture, integration and support of nacelles - the aerodynamic structures which house aircraft engines. Our nacelle technologies improve fuel efficiency, reduce engine noise and supply critical stopping power when an airplane lands. Today, our innovative nacelle systems are featured on many of the world’s newest and most game-changing commercial, regional and business jet platforms. And we’re not stopping there: we’re working hard to create the next generation of nacelles that are greener, quieter and more efficient. In addition, our Engineered Polymer Products division is a leading developer and manufacturer of advanced, high-performance composite and elastomeric structures and products for marine applications. Whether in the air or underwater, we’re pushing the limits of innovation. Want to join us on this important journey?

**Onsite:** Employees who are working in Onsite roles will work primarily onsite. This includes all production and maintenance employees, as they are essential to the development of our products.

**Hybrid:** Employees who are working in Hybrid roles will work regularly both onsite and offsite. Ratio of time working onsite will be determined in partnership with your leader.

**Remote:** Employees who are working in Remote roles will work primarily offsite (from home). An employee may be expected to travel to the site location as needed.

title: Senior Engineer
description:
4-8 years India


The position requires performing numerical analysis for our consulting clients supporting multiple industry applications, specially, Oil & Gas and Energy. The person should have a strong background in structural and solid mechanics and a good understanding of thermal/structural/dynamic loading conditions & failure mechanisms. The person should have extensive experience in Finite Element Analysis (FEA) and be highly proficient with FEA software package Abaqus. To be successful, the person, in addition to strong academic background (Minimum Masters or PhD), must have a keen engineering judgement, analytical and logical reasoning skills, excellent communication skill, and above all, a 'CAN DO' attitude. This is a very critical role for our organization as we strive to be the best in class in technical offerings and client satisfaction. Person will have potential to grow rapidly withing the organization that saw a tremendous year over year growth since the start in 2015. **Essential Functions**
* Help execute consulting services projects related to FEA with minimal supervision.
* Very strong grasp on physics based simulation and verification & validation.
* Help in writing technical and cost proposals.
* Understand the physical problem and how it must be represented in the numerical model.
* Evaluate and interpret the physical response by using proper engineering judgement.
* Work closely with other experts in FEA.
* Elaborate the FEA model by using commercial pre-processing software like Abaqus/CAE.
* Follow the project’s schedule and issue the deliverables on the planned time without comprising the work quality.
* Be responsible for the reliability of all the generated information provided to the client.
* Report the results over an objective, detailed, articulated communication.
* Perform the Quality Check for the pre/post-processing and reports from colleagues.
* Help with automation projects related to kernel scripting and GUI development.
* Engage as a technical expert with activities related to technical content development (blogs, presentations, etc.), webinars, conferences, and seminars.
* Follow company QA and Confidentiality Procedures for technical engagements.
* Engage in technical publications, code committees, industry simulation focus groups, etc.
* Help the CTO and Directors (FEA, CFD, EMAG, etc.) with technical input to development new clients and expand into existing clients.

 **Core Competencies**
* Strong FEA background
* Strong analytical and logical reasoning skills
* Problem-solving attitude and respect for deadlines
* Impeccable attention to details
* Strong work ethics
* High degree of intellectual capability to quickly understand a complex phenomenon
* Consulting and business mindset
* Experience with programming (Python preferred).
* Good team player.
* Autonomy to work independently on remote environment,
* Excellent communication skills (written, verbal)

 **Required Education and Experience**
* M.S. in Engineering in Mechanical, Aerospace, Civil disciplines with 4-8 years of industry experience or Ph.D. (preferred) with 2-4 years of industry experience.
* Excellent understanding of fundamentals of structural and solid mechanics.
* Solid experience with commercial FEA code Abaqus and Python Scripting
* Experience with Energy, Oil & Gas industry.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.

**Overview**


Boeing is the world’s largest aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Building on a legacy of over a century of innovation and leadership, Boeing continues to lead the way in technology and innovation, customer delivery, and investment in its people and future growth of aerospace.


In India, Boeing has been a strong partner to the Indian aerospace and defense sectors for more than 75 years. People at Boeing have been supporting mission readiness and modernization of India’s defense forces, and enabling connected, safer, and smarter flying experiences, in the sky, in the seas, and in space.

**Technology for today and tomorrow**


The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) is a 3000+ diverse engineering workforce that contributes to global aerospace growth. Our engineers deliver cutting-edge R&D, innovation, and high-quality engineering work in global markets, and leverage new-age technologies such as AI/ML, IIoT, Cloud, Model-Based Engineering, and Additive Manufacturing, shaping the future of aerospace.

**People-driven culture**


At Boeing, we believe creativity and innovation thrives when every employee is trusted, empowered, and has the flexibility to choose, grow, learn, and explore. We offer variable arrangements depending upon business and customer needs, and professional pursuits that offer greater flexibility in the way our people work. We also believe that collaboration, frequent team engagements, and face-to-face meetings bring diverse perspectives and thoughts – enabling every voice to be heard and every perspective to be respected. No matter where or how our teammates work, we are committed to positively shaping people’s careers and being thoughtful about employee wellbeing.


At Boeing, we are **inclusive, diverse, and transformative.**


With us, you can create and contribute to what matters most in your career, community, country, and world. Join us in powering the progress of global aerospace.


Boeing Defense and Space Analytics team is looking for **Associate Full Stack Software Developer** to develop and maintain software product for the next generation. In this position the candidate is expected to be hands-on full stack development with excellent programming skills in the latest tools & technologies like React JS, Vue JS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Node JS, Java/J2EE, microservices, APIs. Experience in automated test environments/TDD/JUNITS is required.


This position will be located in the **Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center, Bangalore, India**.

**Position Responsibilities:**

* Estimate user stories/features (story point estimation) and tasks in hours with the required level of accuracy and commit them as part of Sprint Planning.
* Contributes to the Backlog refinement meetings by promptly asking relevant questions to ensure requirements achieve the right level of DOR.
* Works with the Product manager and owner to confirm that the code and acceptance tests reflect the desired functionality.
* Raise any impediments/risks they come across and approaches Scrum Master/Technical Architect/PO accordingly to arrive at a solution.
* Update the status and the remaining efforts for their tasks on a daily basis
* Ensures change requests are treated correctly and tracked in the system, impact analysis done and risks/timelines are appropriately communicated.
* Ability to independently execute & deliver on the backlog without dependency or hand-holding.
* Delivers working software in accordance with expected quality standards.
* Designs for testability: Design and evolve the system to support testability and test automation.


Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.

**Required Skills/Experience:**

* 4-8 years of experience in Software Development
* Excellent programming skills in the latest tools & technology frameworks like, Java/J2EE, NodeJS (Nice to have), React JS, HTML 5, CSS 3 JavaScript etc.
* Must have experience with Spring Framework, REST, JPA/Hibernate.
* Ability to understand API specifications
* Experience in developing services (sync and async) using Microservices Architecture and Design patterns
* Experience in automated test (Mock, Mockito etc.).
* Experience in working in SQL Databases with ability to model and ability to write Stored Procedures - Postgres or MySQL or any other relational databases.
* Front End web development experience in React JS
* Should have demonstrated ability to work in AGILE environment.

**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience ) :**

* Experience in GCP/Azure/AWS
* Domain experience in Aerospace/Navigation Solutions/Geo Spatial technologies
* Knowledge/experience in SAFe agile; pair programming etc
* Knowledge on Android / iOS app development.

description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.

**Overview**


Boeing is the world’s largest (Per Boeing LinkedIn page) aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Boeing


Boeing Defense and Space Analytics team is looking for **Experienced Full Stack Software Developer** to develop and maintain software product for the next generation. In this position the candidate is expected to be hands-on full stack development with excellent programming skills in the latest tools & technologies like React JS, Vue JS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Node JS, Java/J2EE, microservices, APIs. Experience in automated test environments/TDD/JUNITS is required


This position will be located in the Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center, **Bangalore, India**.

* Must have experience with Spring Framework, REST, JPA/Hibernate.
* Ability to understand API specifications
* Experience in developing services (sync and async) using Microservices Architecture and Design patterns
* Experience in automated test (Mock, Mockito etc.).
* Experience in working in SQL Databases with ability to model and ability to write Stored Procedures - Postgres or MySQL or any other relational databases.
* Front End web development experience in React JS
* Should have demonstrated ability to work in AGILE environment.

**Desired Skills (Preferred qualifications):**

* Domain experience in Aerospace/Navigation Solutions/Geo Spatial technologies
* Knowledge/experience in SAFe agile; pair programming etc
* Knowledge on Android / iOS app development

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**The Team:** 

NI is proud to be a part of Emerson's new test and measurement business group. The **Systems R&D** team in the Aerospace, Defense and Government (ADG) Business Unit focuses on test systems for areas such as airplanes, space travel, satellites, and radar. We leverage NI’s portfolio of PXI RF instruments, modular FPGA co-processors, software-defined radios (USRP products), and software tools (LabVIEW, LabVIEW FPGA, open source), the Systems R&D team creates systems at various levels to provide differentiated system-level offerings.


**The Role:**

The **Senior SW Engineer** will be responsible for the development of software components addressing various customer requirements. They will work closely with domain experts within the ADG to build software components, system-level software architectures, and APIs/User Interfaces (UIs).


The role demands an individual who can think at the system level and enjoys working collaboratively in a team setting. The ideal candidate will have a good understanding of OOP and will be ready to jump into NI’s proprietary language LabVIEW and use NI’s internal API’s and libraries.


**Core Job Responsibilities:**

* Design, implement, and test software features and capabilities.
* Design and develop tools and infrastructure to improve development efficiency.
* Test, benchmark, and document customer facing reference architectures.
* Work in an Agile team environment to prioritize work items and leverage resources to deliver features in a release on-time.
* Report into daily agile standup meeting
* Follow and refine coding guidelines and provide effective code reviews.
* Evaluate feature testing strategies and contribute to writing effective test plans.

**Basic Qualifications:**

* 5+ years working experience in SW development.
* Proficiency in one or more programming languages implementing object-oriented design on Windows/Linux
* BS/MS in Electrical Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering, Information Science, Computer Science.
* Mid-level understanding of software design principles.
* Experience with a demonstrated ability in problem-solving, effectively diagnosing technical issues, and proposing reasonable solutions.
* Experience on peer review and git.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Understanding of NI software tools (LabVIEW, TestStand, Veristand).
* Hands on use of NI Hardware Platforms.
* Experience in Electronic/Mechanical Systems such as design and control, SIL, HIL solution.
* Added advantage with modelling and simulation experience such as Simulink, MathWorks, etc.
* Understanding of Agile software development principles.
* Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment experience

**Success Factors:**

* Ability to independently identify and solve application-specific system engineering problems.
* A desire to learn about software architecture & design principles.
* Persistently drives tasks and lead projects to successful completion.
* Implement moderate features to a high level of quality.
* Effectively interact and communicate with engineering teams and management.
* Strong problem-solving skills, work ethic, and drive to succeed.

**Why NI?** 

* For 40 years, **NI** has worked with engineers and scientists to provide answers to the most challenging questions. NI systems accelerate productivity, innovation, and discovery through an open, software-defined platform. This approach helps engineers develop and increase the performance of automated test and automated measurement systems.
* We’ve long been globally recognized as a top employer. Our compensation and benefits are very competitive, as are our modern workspaces, career development, and mobility opportunities, and a culture that fosters belonging and emphasizes community giving. If you want to work on cool stuff at a cool company, you are in the right place!

  
**Why NI?**There are many reasons to consider joining a company. Key among them are the people, the ideas, and the technology. At NI, we believe in the power and potential of connecting the three to create a path to success.  

**The people** : We’re looking for curious and creative problem solvers who value diversity and fresh perspectives, are bold and kind, and willing to take chances.  

**The ideas** : What did you want to be when you grew up? Did you want to program robots? Build flying cars? Leave the world better than you found it? At NI, we build on the big ideas of big dreamers to make their visions a reality.  

**The technology** : With our tailored, software-connected approach, we support our customers through all phases of the product development cycle. From 5G and medical innovations to autonomous driving and the future of space travel, we help our customers Engineer Ambitiously every day.  

We’ve long been globally recognized as a top employer. Our compensation and benefits are very competitive, as are our modern workspaces, career development and mobility opportunities, and a culture that fosters belonging and emphasizes community giving. We encourage our teammates to challenge the status quo and collaborate with one another to build innovative solutions.  

No matter your career path, we’re here for you, for each other, and for the next generation of innovators who think bigger, aim higher, and go faster.  

Are you up for the challenge of helping shape humanity for the next 100 years? If so, let’s get started, and let’s Engineer Ambitiously together.  

  

  

**We are changing how we work by offering more flexibility.** NI has decided to take a hybrid approach (working both on- and off-site) at an aggregate level. We know that different roles have different requirements, so we’re embracing a full range of options.

title: Application Developer
description:
The Railway industry today is characterized by both a strong and sustained growth across the world. The trends that drive this are well known: environmental challenges, population growth, urbanization and increasing demands for mobility. With 7.3 B€ of Sales and over 32,800 employees based in nearly 60 countries, Alstom develop & market the most complete range of systems, equipment and services offered today in the railway sector. Today we offer our customers solutions that feature a seamless blend of diverse technologies, ensuring optimal interfaces, along with flexible implementation and real synergy in innovation

  


INTRODUCTION


As a promoter of sustainable mobility, Alstom develops and markets systems, equipment and services for the transport sector. Alstom offers a complete range of solutions (from high-speed trains to metros, tramways and e-buses), passenger solutions, customised services (maintenance, modernisation), infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility solutions. Alstom is a world leader in integrated transport systems. The company recorded sales of €7.3 billion and booked €10.0 billion of orders in the 2016/17 fiscal year. Headquartered in France, Alstom is present in over 60 countries and employs 32,800 people. UNIFE report forecasts India's accessible market at 4B€ over 2016-18, with growth of 6.6%. Alstom has established a strong presence in India and is currently executing metro projects in several Indian cities including Chennai, Kochi and Lucknow where it is supplying Rolling Stock manufactured out its state of the art facility at SriCity in Andhra Pradesh. In the Mainline space, Alstom is executing Signaling & Power Supply Systems for the 343 Km. section on World Bank funded Eastern Dedicated Freight Corridor. Construction of the new electric locomotive factory for manufacturing and supply of 800 units of high horse power locomotives is also in full swing at Madhepura in Bihar. Alstom has set up an Engineering Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru, and this coupled with a strong manufacturing base as well as localized supply chains, is uniquely positioned to serve customers across the globe. Today, Alstom in India employs close to 3000 people and in line with Government of India’s ‘Make in India’ policy initiative, Alstom has been investing heavily in the country in producing world class rolling stock, components, design, research and development to not only serve the domestic market, but also rest of the world.



Purpose of the Job


* The Interlocking (IXL) is a system composed by Mechanical, Electromechanical, Electric, Electronic and Software components having the aim to ensure safe movements of trains.
* The purpose of the job is to take part to the execution of IXL application design activities of a Signaling project, adopt the Alstom application design process and ensure the delivery accordingly to the projects schedule and quality commitments.
* The IXL Application Design Engineer shares with Project IXL design leader the progress of the activities executed, the issues and the potential improvement that can be applied on methods and tools.
  
  

**Key accountabilities:**


* Deliver design scheme plan layouts, Control Tables, safe HMI layouts, signaling logic application data, hardware configuration drawings, cable core plans, signaling equipment Rooms layout, diagnostic application data
* Ensure the application and adherence to the reference application design methods & tools, requesting in cooperation with the Project IXL design leader deviations whenever appropriate
* Participate actively to the IXL detailed design review meetings and provide activity progress reports
* Organize and produce documental, software and hardware design deliveries accordingly to the project templates and needs
* Support actively the Project IXL design leader and Project V&V manager in design issues debugging
* Analyze and manage design change requests and participate actively to the definition of the HW & SW package to be delivered to the V&V, installation and Testing & Commissioning teams
* Ensure independence of the design activity from the verification activity
  

**Performance management:**


* Project QCD (Quality,Cost and Delivery) commitment
* On-time-delivery for IXL deliverables according to project planning and DML (EDP - Engineering Delivery Performance)
* Defect detected on IXL (DQI - Delivery Quality Indicator)
* Cooperation and reactivity to support to Root Cause Analysis Identification of contract variations (through traceability & coverage of requirements)
  
  

**MAIN REQUIRED COMPETENCES**

  

  

**Educational Requirements**

  

  

**Mandatory:**


* Graduated in Software or Electrical or Electronic or Automation Engineering
  
**Desirable:**


* Railway transport trainings certification
* Autocad, programming language knowledge
  
  

**Experience**

  

  

**Mandatory:**


* 5 year in IXL and/or TMS and/or ERTMS application design or
* 5 year experience in relevant positions (systems / sub-system application design) in a highly complex and normative environment (railway signaling, aerospace, defense).
  
**Desirable:**


* HW Design and SW data generation processes understanding.
* Engineering and system background.
* At least 2 years in relevant positions (systems / sub-system application design) in a highly complex and normative environment (railway signaling, aerospace, defense).
  
  

**Competencies & Skills**


* Open-minded
* Problem setting and problem solving
* Foreign language: English
* Sense of urgency
* Writing skills required: clarity, rigor, and concision
  
  

Alstom is the leading company in the mobility sector, solving the most interesting challenges for tomorrow’s mobility. That’s why we value inquisitive and innovative people who are passionate about working together to reinvent mobility, making it smarter and more sustainable. Day after day, we are building an agile, inclusive and responsible culture, where a diverse group of people are offered opportunities to learn, grow and advance in their careers, with options across functions and geographic locations. Are you ready to join a truly international community of great people on a challenging journey with a tangible impact and purpose?

  


**Equal opportunity statement:**  

Alstom is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating an inclusive working environment where all our employees are encouraged to reach their full potential, and individual differences are valued and respected. All qualified applicants are considered for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by local law.

  

  

**Job Segment:** Facilities, Testing, Developer, Supply, Banking, Operations, Technology, Finance

Position Overview:


Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center (BIETC) has a Job Opening for an **Engineering Manager – Electronic Product Sustenance and CAD** who will be responsible for development and management of engineers in India to perform engineering work-statements for Boeing products.


This position will work collaboratively with the teams from across the globe in an integrated design environment to help deliver engineering statement of work. The selected individual will develop and manage Engineers, interact with the program leaders from across the globe. This position will be located in **BIETC Campus, Bangalore, India** and will be reporting directly to the Boeing India Engineering Senior Manager at Bangalore, India. We are looking for seasoned engineers with strong passion for customer focused solutions, insight, industry knowledge to envision and proven expert over Mentor solutions that will deliver high reliability and safety focused avionics hardware for multi-platform applications.

**Position Responsibilities:**

This position will be responsible to deliver hardware solutions that shall work reliably and safely for space, aviation and ground based applications to enable value generation across product lines for new configuration and solution deployment. The selected candidates should have strong awareness of Aerospace Electronic Hardware Development process. The candidate shall printed wiring board design process, sustainment of electronic hardware developed and lead SOI audits with suppliers.


and electronics product delivery, product operation, in-service, maintenance and product disposal engineering activity.

* Facilitate interactions with cross functional engineering organizations to lead ebug collaboration projects with hardware, firmware and software teams through causal analysis and resolution techniques over reports arising from field and production.
* Lead and manage a lean development team for creation of printed wiring circuit board artifacts using Expedition. Build capability over analog, digital and mixed signal ECAD services for complex stackups over aerospace applications.
* Facilitate interactions with cross functional product engineering teams such as production, quality, equipment unit members and so on to enable team to execute re-entry to service plans.
* Project Planning and scheduling of activities of local team and present and report progress on regular basis. Accountable for leading execution forums and driving team meetings towards
	+ In service and production support resolutions
	+ Create, change control, modify and introduce documents and bulletins through the PLM tools.
	+ Issue resolution and root cause analysis
	+ Test Plan and its infrastructure development
* Address Systems-Hardware-Software-Production Development process in accordance with DO 254 processes and its sustenance, demonstrate through SOI Audit deployments though team. Collaborate, walk the high line, and help team deliver in a comprehensive capability.
* Deploy competitive technology roadmaps over printed wiring board designs for compact, thermally efficient and high throughput yield solutions while ensuring 100% quality.
* Use Data to effectively communicate with partners and stakeholders progress on design, development and production deliverables.
* Communication – strong written and verbal communication skills, ability to prepare comprehensive reports, proposals, Statements of Work, and connect technology to business considerations (e.g., ROI). Candidate must be fluent in English, and familiar with MS Office tools.
* Will take a particular team through successful stage gate reviews like requirements reviews, design reviews, test reviews, quality reviews, production readiness reviews at a minimum.
* Develop training plans for talent reviews and people competency development plans.

**Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* Bachelors or Master’s degree is required.
* 13 to 16 Years of experience of technical engineering experience, has delivered dense processor based printed wiring boards, power supply and mixed signal printed wiring boards
* Has led at least two complete SOI audits across DO-254 processes.
* Thorough knowledge of aerospace engineering standards for design, testing & certification.
* Experience in PLM Tools, created ECO/ECN/PCR to be able to distribute resolution activities to various functional groups.
* Experience in Configuration Management, demonstrated leading proposals through a change management board.
* Experience with standards such as DO-160, DO-254 and MIL-STD-810, or equivalent commercial industry standards with a high focus on SIL needs
* Understands PMA/STC and other equivalent processes
* Strong knowledge on IPC standards
* Self-Motivated and ability to work independently and sometimes under extreme pressure
* Ability to work with different functional and delivery teams.
* Candidate must be a self-starter with a positive attitude, high ethics, and a track record of working successfully under pressure in a time-constrained environment.

**Preferred Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* 2+ Years in managing Printed wiring Board Design teams.
* Field support experience, relevant to Avionics.
* Demonstrated engineering leadership experience in a major aerospace organization; ability to understand and communicate with USA based Executives/managers, and expert over a wide range of engineering disciplines.
* 5+ years of experience managing large teams and independently delivering work statements.

**Typical Education & Experience:**

* Education/experience typically acquired through advanced education (e.g. Bachelor) and typically 13+ or more years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience (e.g. Master 12+ years' related work experience.)

**Relocation:**

This position offers relocation within India.

 **Export Control Requirements:** Not an export control position **Equal Opportunity Employer:**

title: Structural Designer
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. Boeing is the world’s largest (Per Boeing LinkedIn page) aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Building on a legacy of over a century of innovation and leadership, Boeing continues to lead the way in technology and innovation, customer delivery, and investment in its people and future growth of aerospace.

**Technology for today and tomorrow**


The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) is a 3000+ diverse engineering workforce that contributes to global aerospace growth. At Boeing, we are all innovators on a mission to connect, protect, explore and inspire. From the seabed to outer space, you’ll learn and grow, contributing to work that shapes the world. Find your future with us.


At the highest level, diversity and inclusion are part of Boeing's values. Having diverse employees, business partners and community relationships is vital to creating advanced aerospace and defense products and services for our diverse customers around the world. The company's commitment to diversity means providing a work environment for all employees that is welcoming, respectful and engaging, with opportunities for personal and professional development.


Boeing India Engineering is currently looking **Experienced** **S****tructures Design Engineer** to join their team in **Bangalore, Karnataka**. This position will focus on supporting the Boeing Commercial Airplanes (BCA), Boeing Defense, Space and Security (BDS) and Boeing Global Services (BGS) business organizations.


A successful candidate will understand the importance of collaboration and shall work with the **Engineering Manager**, Project lead & Aerospace Mechanical Design and Systems expert to develop or optimize the designs, engineering process, analyze the supplier quality issues, support the development of cutting-edge technologies and digital initiatives.

**Position Responsibilities:**

* Work on Structures Engineering Design and Analysis Solutions’ function and develops Knowledge Based Integrated Tools to accelerate Enterprise to 2nd Century
* The selected candidate is required to have relevant work experience in Structures Engineering Design and Analysis and full stack software development to continuously improve and optimize solutions for complex engineering and manufacturing processes to throughout the value stream.
* Facilitates development of system integration strategies and architectures that promote use of common tools and processes.
* Integration of new technologies and the transition from legacy systems to support business requirements. Implementation of program transition plans to improve existing processes and optimize the effective application of new tool technology.
* Defines and validates complex requirements for new and revised hardware and software systems. Design, development and test of applications and systems. Guides and coordinates development and deployment of new or revised processes in support of new computing systems, including documentation and training.
* Develops, documents and implements plans and processes to ensure products meet technical, data, regulatory and company requirements and to maintain configuration control.
* Utilizes extensive knowledge of product design and build processes and applies principles of Lean Product Development, Theory of Constraints and Critical Chain Project Management to construct program planning models simulating the multi-functional dependencies of the product development lifecycle.
* Development plans, schedules and resource commitments to develop, test and deploy process improvements and changes.
* Prior experience in Design and Development of Mechanical and Structural components, & System perform, requirement validation, verification, Development assurance, create qualification test planning & reporting and support initiatives of Boeing India organization related to engineering excellence, employee development, customer engagement etc.
* Prior experience in technical quality review of the development and documentation of Mechanical, Structural & fluid systems and thermal environment to establish the system design.
* Prior experience in components' designs/proposals to provide installation and detail documentation.
* Prior Experience in analyses of mechanisms/landing gear/ordnance components and systems selecting appropriate methods to validate or assess the design.
* Prioritizes, delegates and tracks performance and documentation
* Supports proposal preparation and new business development efforts.
* Works under minimal direction.
* Responsibility includes creation of planning, scheduling, peer reviewing and meet the on-time delivery and first-time quality.
* This position will be responsible for coordinating and communicating regularly with team members in Boeing organizations and shall provide periodic update on project progress, quality metrics, project summaries, and other related documents.
* This position will be located in Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center, Bangalore, India.

**Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* Required Bachelor or Master degree in Mechanical, Aerospace, Aeronautical or equivalent disciplines.
* 8 to 12 Years of relevant Work experience (for masters’ please refer next section). 7 to 11 years relevant experience in array of software skills including Python, Visual Basic plus, Graphical User Interfaces (GUIs), HTML, C++ or similar and Databases.
* Expert level competency of design of Aircraft structures, Mechanical or Hydraulic components.
* Experience of Spares engineering investigation and in-service issues.
* Working knowledge of System Safety Analysis, assessment etc.,
* Experience of performing Requirement Decomposition, Creating Test plan & procedures and
* participation in Certification process.
* Experience in Performing requirement validation, traceability analysis
* Experience in Mechanical System Design & Analysis, structural design, DFX (X- Manufacturing, Assembly, Optimization etc.)Tier 1, 2 and 3 requirements, Certification process, Development and Verification of Aircraft systems towards certifications etc.
* Perform with positive attitude and highest ethics.

**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**

* Experience in aerospace material selection, drawing (Drawing based or MBD creation), processes
* (finishing and heat treatment) specifications, perform analyses like tolerance stack up, FRACAS,
* Engineering or product quality investigation analyses.
* Experience in aircraft systems (Mechanical, Structural, flight controls, Actuation etc.,).
* Experience of independently developing designs using CAD Tools (CATIA, CREO Unigraphics /NX, CATIAV5,3DExperience(3DX)) for Modeling, Drafting & Model Based Definition is essential.
* Work experience with C/C++, Python, PERL, VB, Java/J2EE, VC++, MFC, COM, UML, SysML Rational Rose, Tcl/Tk, Geometric Kernels – CAA, ACIS, PARASOLID, MBSE/CAMEO, VSS, SOS, Perforce-4, Clear case, Insure++, Glow Code, Rational purifier and VSS, SOS, Perforce-4, Clear case
* Experience of design and development as part of New Product development process, redesigns and Inservice design investigations.
* Knowledge of stress analysis and Aerospace requirements at system and LRU level.
* Thorough understanding of aircraft certification processes and lifecycle.
* Experience in assigning GD&T and ability to understand the develop rationale for supplier designs and change proposals.
* Able to generate cost-out ideas, value engineering proposals.
* Experience in Model Based Engineering using tools like 3DX etc.,
* Experience on use of PDM/PLM tools such as ENOVIA or Team Center.
* Knowledge of Data analytics and awareness of programming languages like Python etc.,
* Able to verify accuracy of technical and non-technical data. Gathers relevant data for root cause
* analysis and produces changes to resolve the discrepancies in design packages.
* Must be able to work collaboratively with cross-functional team. Must be willing to work flexible hours (early or late as needed) to interface with Boeing personnel around the world.

Education/experience typically acquired through advanced education (e.g. Bachelor) and typically 8 to 12 years' related work experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience

title: Engineer
description:
Quest Global is an organization at the forefront of innovation and one of the world’s fastest growing engineering services firms with deep domain knowledge and recognized expertise in the top OEMs across seven industries. We are a twenty-five-year-old company on a journey to becoming a centenary one, driven by aspiration, hunger and humility.


We are looking for humble geniuses, who believe that engineering has the potential to make the impossible, possible; innovators, who are not only inspired by technology and innovation, but also perpetually driven to design, develop, and test as a trusted partner for Fortune 500 customers.


As a team of remarkably diverse engineers, we recognize that what we are really engineering is a brighter future for us all. If you want to contribute to meaningful work and be part of an organization that truly believes when you win, we all win, and when you fail, we all learn, then we’re eager to hear from you.


The achievers and courageous challenge-crushers we seek, have the following characteristics and skills:

 **Key Technical Competencies:**

* Teamcenter/NX Manager
* NX CAM Programing
* Machine knowledge 3,4& 5 Axis
* Various special process for Aero components
* NX Process Planning
* MBD - Model Based Definition
* Parametric Modelling
* Master Modelling Concepts
* Concept Modelling
* GD & T expertise, ASME (INCH), ISO (MM) certification
* Productive ideas, projects Handled
* List of Parts in Aeroengine parts
* Cost Saving Projects
* Awards & Accreditation received
* Proficient in 3D Modelling, assembly and detailing using NX or any CAD packages & PLM, PDM.
* Create/Modify Process planning stage models and drawings, Jigs and Fixtures through NX tool platform in a PLM environment.
* Migration of Legacy data to PLM environment in line with standard operating procedure (OP) and best practices. (BP)
* Working knowledge of Aero/Gas turbine Engines parts
* Good Modelling and detailed knowledge of complex geometrics like Discs, Airfoils
* Aviation experience is preferred.
  

**Key Leadership Competencies and Soft Skills:**  

* Good Communication and interpersonal skills
* Excellent writing and speaking skills in English Languages
* Proactive approach and work in a fast paced environment
* Ability to build and develop Customer & Supplier relationships
* Open Minded and logical thinking
* Can Do and Can Get it Done Attitude
* See failures and frustration as an opportunity to improve
* To interact with customer to understand the requirements.

  

**Required Skills:**  

* NX CAD/CAM
* Vericut Simulation
* Any Stack up tools

  

**Qualification and Professional Experience:*** Masters/BE/Diploma in Mechanical or Aerospace Engineering or Aeronautical Engineering
* 3 to 8 Years of working experience on aero engines in an airlines/ Aerospace & Defense or related organization.
* Knowledge of aero engine manufacturing process would be an added advantage
* In-depth understanding of gas turbine fundamentals.
* In-depth knowledge of gas turbine engines, its associated components and their function during operation.
* **Work Location:**  

Bangalore
  


**Education Type**


BEng-Mechanical Engineering
**Job Type**


Full Time-Regular
**Experience Level**

title: Stress Engineer
description:
Quest Global is an organization at the forefront of innovation and one of the world’s fastest growing engineering services firms with deep domain knowledge and recognized expertise in the top OEMs across seven industries. We are a twenty-five-year-old company on a journey to becoming a centenary one, driven by aspiration, hunger and humility.


We are looking for humble geniuses, who believe that engineering has the potential to make the impossible, possible; innovators, who are not only inspired by technology and innovation, but also perpetually driven to design, develop, and test as a trusted partner for Fortune 500 customers.


As a team of remarkably diverse engineers, we recognize that what we are really engineering is a brighter future for us all. If you want to contribute to meaningful work and be part of an organization that truly believes when you win, we all win, and when you fail, we all learn, then we’re eager to hear from you.


The achievers and courageous challenge-crushers we seek, have the following characteristics and skills:

 **Roles & Responsibilities:**

* Individual contributor working in Design engineering delivering analysis tasks mainly Solid mechanics & thermal for a part / product in line with functional KPI of the organization.
* Supporting the structural design process to ensure required quality is achieved within direct area of responsibility
* Supporting continuous improvement initiatives to increase team efficiency
* Develop, implement, and check technical solutions and compliance documentation to ensure they are compliant with all relevant customer, regulatory, and airworthiness requirements, within agreed program, schedule, and manufacturing constraints.
* Identify technical problems and apply/integrate solutions.
* Execute and implement methods plans, toolsets and approaches that are appropriate and compliant to achieve the design and programme objectives.
* Identify and assess technical risk for own work and propose mitigations within assigned programmes/projects.
* Generate assigned project deliverables, documents, and reports according to the project signature authorizations.
* Support technical and customer reviews, including formal gate reviews, including the creation and preparation of technical data and presentations of product design.
* Process documentation such as concessions and non-conformances, and provide technical support by implementing solutions to address non-conforming products, designs, and compliance documentation.
* Perform all activities at a level of minimal supervision and support other engineers with peer-to-peer reviews.
* Identify improvements and support the creation of work instructions, procedures, technical manuals, and guidelines.

**Required Skills (Technical Competency):**

* Holds relevant technical qualifications (Bachelor, Master or equivalent) or a relevant level of experience to perform the stress engineering tasks.
* 3-7 years of experience with strong knowledge of airframe static stress, fatigue and damage tolerance analysis including FEA & hand calculation methods.
* Must possess basic knowledge and understanding of the Aerospace industry and in the functional area the project/programme is responsible for (eg. Design, Analysis, EWIS, etc.) in order to successfully perform tasks in the programme.
* Sound knowledge of structural design principles, aircraft loads and Aero fatigue manuals.
* Experience in fatigue and damage tolerance analysis of aircraft structural components (Airbus methods and tools would be preferable).
* Sound knowledge of the overall static structural substantiation process from definition of external loads through airframe finite element analysis to final check stress clearance.
* Sound knowledge of airframe fatigue substantiation including safe life and fracture mechanics techniques.
* Sound knowledge of Airworthiness Requirements.
* Working experience on creating stress justification reports and related stress hand calculations in consultation with Check/Approval signatories.
* Able to execute/check finite element modelling methodology, interpret results and generally design assure the model output.
* Strong experience in Metallic - Linear & Non Linear Static, Fatigue analysis.
* Supporting continuous improvement initiatives to increase team efficiency.
* Support or generate test specifications/plans and/or alternate means of compliance (analysis/similarity) as required to demonstrate design solution complies with certification requirements.
* 
* Must possess an appropriate level of engineering functional knowledge (typically Technical Excellence Framework level 2 or higher in the appropriate Area of Expertise) with experience or knowledge of working/interfacing with other Engineering & Manf. Eng. disciplines (including customers and suppliers) in order to successfully execute the functional project team(s) objectives.
* Must have an awareness of the Aerospace industry and in the functional area the project/programme is responsible for (e.g. Design, Analysis, ME, etc.) in order to successfully support the whole of the IPT in achieving the overall business objectives.
* Must possess a good level of technical problem solving skills.

**Desired Skills:**

* Must have 4-7 years’ experience in Stress/Thermal/ life analysis through FEM
* Excellent fundamentals in Solid Mechanics
* Experience in performing structural analysis to verify various product requirements
* Ability to interpret results, applying physics and propose design solutions
* Knowledge of tools such as Simcenter3D, HYPERMESH and ANSYS, for meshing and analysis along with demonstrated capability in using these tools effectively
* Good product knowledge related to aero engines
* Contributed to the technical development of processes, products or people
* Customization and Programming skills, preferably using ANYSYS APDL/Python

  



**Education Type**


B.E/B.Tech/BS-Mechanical Engineering
**Job Type**


Full Time-Regular
**Experience Level**


Mid Level
**Total Years of Exp**


3 - 6

title: Software Engineer
description:
RapidAI is the global leader in using AI to combat life-threatening vascular and neurovascular conditions. RapidAI is empowering physicians to make faster decisions for better patient outcomes, leading the next evolution of clinical decision-making and patient workflow. Based on intelligence gained from over 10 million scans in more than 2,000 hospitals in over 60 countries, the Rapid® platform transforms care coordination, offering care teams a level of patient visibility never before possible. RapidAI – where AI meets patient care.
### **POSITION DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES**

+ Design complex systems and architectures for their area of specialization. Ensure scalability performance, and reliability of those systems.
+ Plan technical projects and milestone deliverables in alignment with product managers.
+ Coordinate engineers and their tasks and monitor overall progress.
+ Design and build impactful technical solutions and own them through the entire development lifecycle.
+ Develop complex features and components. Review code and designs developed by other engineers. Debug difficult issues across the codebase.
+ Research the latest technologies and propose ways to integrate them to improve the product. Come up with solutions for technical challenges and improvements.
+ Evaluate technical options and tradeoffs and make sound technical decisions aligned with product needs in their specialized area.
+ Perform rigorous code reviews and ensure coding best practices, standards and patterns are followed by teams.
+ Debug and troubleshoot complex production issues and assist teams in resolution.
+ Clearly communicate complex technical concepts and designs to both technical and non-technical audiences. Collaborate cross functionally across product, program management and other teams.
+ Create documentation, present training materials, conduct tech talks to share knowledge with broader engineering org.

### **EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE, AND QUALIFICATIONS:**

+ Bachelors’ Degree or equivalent
+ 8+ years of experience in software development and demonstrated engineering leadership
+ 5+ years of experience in backend development
+ 2+ years in using Typescript and Amazon AWS
+ High level of skill in at least one general-purpose backend language and one frontend language, but willingness to work with other languages if required
+ High level of distributed system design skill
+ Creating platforms, reusable libraries, and utilities wherever applicable
+ Writing high-quality code that is modular, functional, and testable
+ Troubleshoot issues effectively in a distributed architecture
+ Communicate, collaborate and work effectively in a global environment
+ Solid analytical and reasoning skills for design, troubleshooting and root cause analysis
+ Great communication skills with technical and non-technical teams
+ iOS or Android development experience; Swift, Kotlin and good understanding of Native mobile
+ Experience in a regulated software environment e.g. medical device, aerospace, defense, automotive
+ Experience with DICOM, HL7 or other medical data formats/protocols

### **BONUS SKILLS**

+ iOS or Android development experience; Swift, Kotlin and good understanding of Native mobile
+ Experience in a regulated software environment e.g. medical device, aerospace, defense, automotive
+ Experience with DICOM, HL7 or other medical data formats/protocols

RapidAI is committed to creating an inclusive and diverse workplace. We provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants and prohibit discrimination and harassment of any type in regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

title: Engineering Lead
description:
* Lead a team of 1000+ people, by overseeing all aspects of engineering
* Report directly to the CEO and driving strategic leadership
**About Our Client**
--------------------


Our client is a leading player in the aviation industry, with strong domestic and international presence.

**Job Description**
-------------------


As Head - Engineering, you would report to the CEO. Key responsibilities -

* Provide strategic direction and leadership to the engineering department, fostering a culture of excellence, safety, and continuous improvement.
* Build and lead a high-performing team of engineers and technicians, fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment
* Develop and implement staffing plans, training programs, and performance management processes to ensure the department's success.
* Oversee all aspects of aircraft maintenance, including scheduled and unscheduled maintenance, repairs, and modifications, to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.
* Develop and implement maintenance programs, policies, and procedures to optimize fleet reliability, availability, and cost-effectiveness.
* Ensure timely resolution of technical issues and effective coordination with internal stakeholders, external vendors, and regulatory authorities.
* Stay abreast of relevant aviation regulations, airworthiness directives, and manufacturer recommendations, ensuring full compliance in all engineering and maintenance activities.
* Liaise with regulatory agencies and participate in audits, inspections, and certifications to maintain the airline's operational approvals and certifications.
* Collaborate with other departments, such as flight operations, planning, and procurement, to support fleet planning, acquisitions, retirements, and transitions.
* Conduct technical evaluations of aircraft, engines, and components, providing recommendations for fleet optimization and expansion.
* Champion a safety-first culture within the engineering department, promoting adherence to safety protocols, procedures, and best practices.
* Establish and maintain quality assurance processes to monitor and improve the quality and reliability of maintenance and engineering operations.
* Develop and manage the engineering department budget, ensuring effective allocation of resources and cost control measures
* Identify opportunities for cost savings, process improvements, and efficiency enhancements to maximize operational performance and financial sustainability.
**The Successful Applicant**
----------------------------


Aerospace / Mechanical Engineer with 20+ years of experience, with at least 8 years of leadership experience. You should be well versed with all aspects of aviation engineering - aircraft engineering, safety, maintenance, etc.  

  

Open to Indians as well as expats.

**What's on Offer**

Opportunity to lead engineering for one of the leading players in the airline industry.

title: Lead Engineer
description:
**Job Description Summary**
===========================


Engine Dynamics is a critical domain for aircraft engines as it impacts the entire product life cycle of the engine, starting with conceptual design thru product design & certification, and field support. The main objective of the engine dynamics team is to develop a rotor dynamically stable engine ensuring safety & reliability while finding an optimal balance between performance, weight & cost. The team is critical to realizing GE Aerospace’s noble vision in developing next generation RISE (Revolutionary Innovation for Sustainable Engine) engines.  

The main responsibilities for this role include, but not limited to, perform accurate rotordynamic analysis, provide engine loads to the design teams helping with mechanical design, lead low to moderate complexity programs, contribute towards technology maturation, advance state of the art of predictive methods, collaboratively work across multiple teams, organizations & global sites to share knowledge base.**Job Description**
===================

**Roles and Responsibilities**

* Independent execution with minimal direction from experts on analysis & design of rotordynamic system/sub-system assemblies for nextgen sustainable engine programs to develop technologies meeting ambitious performance & environmental goals.
* Understand key business drivers, contribute towards developing program plan and deliver impactful business outcomes. Integrate work of self/team with other teams and contribute to broader business objectives.
* Lead and contribute to solving tough technical challenges, as an integral part of a collaborative global team.
* Propose innovative solutions and proactively protect GE's competitive advantage by filing IP.
* Present in global reviews with peers/experts, Chief Engineers Office and Systems organization.
* Ensure proper documentation of technical data consistent with engineering policies and procedures.
* Good interpersonal skills, flexibility to work on a wide variety of problems/programs of interest to GE Aerospace.
* Uses multiple internal and limited external sources outside of own teams to arrive at decisions.
* Acts as a mentor for colleagues with less experience. May lead small projects with low to moderate risks and resource requirements.
* Conveys performance expectations and may handle sensitive issues.

**Required Qualifications**

* B-Tech/M-Tech/Ph. D with 9+ years of experience in mechanical design & analysis of aircraft engine models.
* Postgraduate in Mechanical or Aerospace engineering with excellent academic background.
* In-depth understanding of mechanical engineering fundamentals.
* Proficiency in application of HYPERMESH, Unigraphics, NASTRAN software
* Strong oral and written communication skills.
* Ability to meet stringent deadlines and commitments.

**Desired Characteristics**

* Exposure to FAA regulations and aerospace industry
* Exposure to LEAN, Design For Six Sigma tools and techniques
* Strong interpersonal and leadership skills
* Aircraft engines/Gas turbine product knowledge


www.ge.com

**Additional Information**
==========================

**Relocation Assistance Provided:** No

title: Design Engineer
description:
**Key Responsibilities:**

**Technical Analysis:** Conduct feasibility studies, simulations, and analysis to validate design concepts and ensure compliance with performance specifications and industry standards.

**CAD Modelling:** Utilize Computer-Aided Design (CAD / SolidWorks ) software to create detailed 2D and 3D models of components, assemblies, and systems.

**Prototype Development:** Work closely with prototyping teams to build and test prototypes, iterate designs based on feedback and performance testing results.

**Design Optimization:** Continuously refine and optimize designs to improve performance, reliability, cost-effectiveness, and ease of manufacturing.

**Materials and Manufacturing Selection:** Evaluate and select appropriate materials, manufacturing processes, and suppliers to ensure quality, cost efficiency, and scalability of production.

**Documentation:** Prepare comprehensive design documentation, including drawings, specifications, bills of materials (BOM), and technical reports.

**Collaboration:** Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, including mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, industrial designers, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration of design solutions into overall product development efforts.

**Problem-solving:** Identify and resolve design challenges and technical issues encountered during the development lifecycle, employing analytical thinking and innovative problem-solving skills.

**Quality Assurance:** Participate in design reviews, conduct risk assessments, and implement quality control measures to ensure the reliability, safety, and regulatory compliance of products.

**Qualifications:**.

* Proven experience in product design and development, preferably in a relevant industry such as consumer electronics, automotive, aerospace, or medical devices.
* Proficiency in CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD, CATIA) and simulation tools (e.g., Finite Element Analysis).
* Strong understanding of engineering principles, materials science, and manufacturing processes.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Effective communication and teamwork abilities.
* Familiarity with project management methodologies and product lifecycle management (PLM) systems is a plus.
* Willingness to stay updated with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in design engineering.

BE / B-Tech / ME / M-Tech or any other equivalent degree.

**About Collins Aerospace:**


Collins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market.  

  

Our Avionics team advances aviation electronics and information management solutions for commercial and military customers across the world. That means we’re helping passengers reach their destination safely. We’re connecting aircraft operators, airports, rail and critical infrastructure with intelligent data service solutions that keep passengers, flight crews and militaries connected and informed. And we’re providing industry-leading fire protection and safety systems that our customers can count on when it matters most. Are you ready to learn from the most knowledgeable experts in the industry, develop the technologies of tomorrow and reach new heights in your career? Join our Avionics team today.

  

We make modern flight possible for millions of travelers and our military every second. Our major product lines are on-board virtually every aircraft flying. Be it keeping passengers safe with our emergency power generation systems or creating a positive in-flight experience through reliable cabin pressure controls and quieter engines, Power & Controls focuses on delivering a best-in-class experience to our customers. We hire the top people in the industry. Their ideas drive our performance, and their integrity keeps our customers happy. Join us as we take flight!

**Collins Aerospace Diversity & Inclusion Statement:**

**Diversity drives innovation; inclusion drives success**. We believe a multitude of approaches and ideas enable us to deliver the best results for our workforce, workplace, and customers. We are committed to fostering a culture where all employees can share their passions and ideas so we can tackle the toughest challenges in our industry and pave new paths to limitless possibility.

**WE ARE REDEFINING AEROSPACE.**


Some of our competitive benefits package includes:


* Group Term Life Insurance.
* Group Health Insurance.
* Group Personal Accident Insurance.
* Entitled for 22 days of vacation and 7 days of contingency leave annually.
* Employee scholar program.
* Work life balance.
* Car lease program.
* National Pension Scheme
* LTA
* Fuel & Maintenance /Driver wages
* Meal vouchers
* And more!


Nothing matters more to Collins Aerospace than our strong ethical and safety commitments. As such, all India. positions require a background check, which may include a drug screen.


Note:

* Background check and drug screen required

  

At Collins, the paths we pave together lead to limitless possibility. And the bonds we form – with our customers and with each other - propel us all higher, again and again.

  



Apply now and be part of the team that’s redefining aerospace, every day.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Date Posted:**


2023-11-01**Country:**


India**Location:**


North Gate Business Park Sy.No 2/1, and Sy.No 2/2, KIAL Road, Venkatala Village, Chowdeshwari Layout, Yelahanka, Bangalore, Karnataka 560064**Position Role Type:**


Unspecified**Overview:**

This opening is for a software verification and validation engineer to support Oxygen projects (DAL B) at Interiors software group of Collins Aerospace. Requires about 5-6 years of experience on DO178B/C V&V activities.

**Position:** Lead Software Engineer - (Software V&V) P2 grade.

**Primary Roles and Responsibilities:**

* End to end software Verification and Validation activities as per DO178B/C guidelines.
* Assist in preparation of software certification documents as per DO178B/C guidelines (SVCP, SVR).
* Ensures compliance to Verification processes and standard work requirements.
* Will be responsible for software V&V according to desired specifications.
* Responsible for the Oxygen software verification and validation
* Develop Test cases from the software requirements.
* Develop Test scripts using ‘C’ and Python.
* Performing Structural coverage analysis.
* Participate in SOI / Gate review Audits.
* Will be responsible for White Box Testing, Black Box Testing and Integration Testing.
* Verification of protocols, interfaces, and hardware subsystems requirements (SPI, I2C o similar )
* Handle the configuration management tools, Requirement management tools, defect tracking tools and peer review process independently.
* Will work with multi-disciplinary teams such as Project engineering, software engineering, electrical design, safety and reliability.
* Full time responsibility as Lead Software Engineer.
* Test the software with quality and optimize I/O performance.
* Analyze and report the bugs and optimize the system.
* Interface with hardware design and development.
* Interact with US/Europe POCs for close coordination of the project activities.

**Qualifications:**

* B.Tech/M.Tech (Computer Science/Electronics or Equivalent).
* Relevant industry experience on DAL B DO178B/C V&V and software certification documents.
* Familiar with SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle).
* Critical thinker and problem-solving skills.

title: Lead Engineer
description:
**Date Posted:**


2023-09-11**Country:**


India**Location:**


North Gate Business Park Sy.No 2/1, and Sy.No 2/2, KIAL Road, Venkatala Village, Chowdeshwari Layout, Yelahanka, Bangalore, Karnataka 560064**Position Role Type:**


Unspecified**Overview:**

In this role the Lead Engineer (Electronic Systems, Advanced Structures) actively participate in NPI, redesign and sustenance activities of electronics used for Actuator applications.

**Position: Lead Engineer (P2)**

**Primary Responsibilities:**

* MBSE (Model Based System Engineering) approach based Embedded Control Systems design and development.
* Requirement Modelling, Simulation, Validation and Analysis using Matlab/Simulink.
* PID Based Control design.
* Experience in Time and Frequency domain analysis
* Stability analysis
* Experience in Digital Signal Processing (IIR/FIR Filter Design, FFT Analysis, Data Analysis, Feature extraction
* Interpret Customer requirements and defining the system level requirements at electronics box level.
* Validating the System level requirements, Architecture and low-level requirements using simulation methods
* Hands on with System Requirements review process and Review of next level flow down requirements for Top-down trace.
* Familiarity with System requirement and management Tools (DOORs, Polarion/LiveDoc, Jira etc)
* Hands on experience with communication protocols like CAN, ARINC 429, RS422, Time Triggered Protocol.
* System level Verification and Integration testing.
* Estimate effort and specify schedules for System Verification activities.
* Working with multi-disciplinary teams such as project engineering, software engineering, electrical design, safety and reliability
* Strong problem solving and analytical capability.

**Basic Qualifications:**

* 4 to 6 years of Industry experience in electronics system design and development
* BE/B-tech/M-Tech in Electrical /Electronic Engineering
* Solid communication, writing skills and teaming skills are a must.

2024-02-25**Country:**


India**Location:**


North Gate Business Park Sy.No 2/1, and Sy.No 2/2, KIAL Road, Venkatala Village, Chowdeshwari Layout, Yelahanka, Bangalore, Karnataka 560064**Position Role Type:**


Unspecified**Job Description Title: Senior Lead Engineer – Displays** **(Hybrid)**  

**Experience: 4 to 6 Years**

Working in capacity of Lead Engineer producing technically for Collins Displays Application Software Applications. Operating in Agile Work environment the individual is required to assume responsibilities, take ownership of the tasks in hand to navigate through the roadblocks and Technical Challenges.

* Understanding of Model-based development methods and tools- MATLAB,
* Strong Programming Skills C/C++, Python
* Exposure working on DO178B/C safety-critical applications.
* Analytical and Problem Solver, Autonomous, Self-Driven, Good Communication Skills, Quick Learner and Team Player.
* Experience working in Agile teams and Nice to have DevOps Understanding

**Technical Job Responsibilities**

* Contribute technically to the Program objectives.
* Provide and implement Solutions to medium & complex technical Challenges
* Coordinating and collaborating with the global teams
* Provide technical expertise to support the Verification, Design and Development of Model-Based Applications.

* Experience working in Agile teams and Nice to have DevOps Understanding

* Provide and implement Solutions to medium & complex technical Challenges

* Provide technical expertise to support the Verification, Design and Development of Model-Based Applications.
* Technical leadership, Coaching, Project Management and Strong Communication and Interpersonal Skills

BE / BTech / ME / MTech in Computer Sc/ IT /Electronics and Communication / Avionics / Aeronautical

Be it keeping passengers safe with our emergency power generation systems or creating a positive in-flight experience through reliable cabin pressure controls and quieter engines, Power & Controls focuses on delivering a best-in-class experience to our customers.
